title: Amazon Expert
job_overview:
We’re looking for an experienced Amazon Expert to help manage and grow our Amazon store. Responsibilities include listing optimization, keyword research, PPC campaign management, inventory planning, and overall account health.

Requirements:

Proven experience managing Amazon Seller Central

Strong knowledge of SEO and PPC strategies

Ability to analyze sales data and suggest improvements

Excellent communication and organizational skills

If you're passionate about e-commerce and have a track record of success on Amazon, we’d love to hear from you! Please send your resume and relevant experience.
